Summary: Very bright light......I thought it was a star at first. Light was very bright. Then quickly faded while maving a very shoert distance in the night sky.
divs: Sighting DetailsVery bright light......I thought it was a star at first. Light was very bright. Then quickly faded while maving a very short distance in the night sky. Anyone else see anything like this before? Maybe a aviation move via a light reaction?
